item.title: Help with specs on dif weps
item.dc:creator: @hippie hippie
item.description:
@hippie wrote:

idk how to make this work…

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4151) { hitDiff = misc.random(40); stillgfx(341, targ.absY, targ.absX); } else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1377) { hitDiff = misc.random(40); stillgfx(341, targ.absY, targ.absX); } [br][size=1]Posted on: July 31, 2007, 03:38:14 PM[/size][hr]nvm i got it

@Fir3_Flam3 wrote:

} else {
		sendMessage("You need more special energy to do that");
		resetBar();
		}
		return true;
		} else {

Is the last else { meant to be there?

item.title: Help with specs on dif weps

item.description:
@hippie wrote:

yeh i used this post for two questions ignore the irrelivent ones.

since my spec only works on whip. in my attack boolean could i add

[code] if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] = ####)
{ stillgfx(###, targ.absY, targ.absX);
hitDiff = misc.random(##);
}

[/code]
?? and then i would have to do an else if afterwards right?
